attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our monarchy, and the law which protects it, appears incompatible with Article 1 of the International Declaration of Human Rights which states that "All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights."

We the undersigned do not have the right to be monarch, so there is an inequality.

Our requests:

1. Change the law so that an elected head of state can be appointed.

2. Retire the monarchy.

Ref: http://www.un.org/Overview/rights.html
